question: Who has has been awarded as the 'most inspiring icon of the year for Social Welfare" recently?
explanation: Indian star cricketer Yuvraj Singh has been awarded the 'most inspiring icon of the year for Social Welfare". The award was given by the Dadasaheb Phalke International Film Festival for his exemplary contribution in the field of social welfare. Yuvraj opened his foundation 'YouWeCan' that focuses on creating cancer awareness.
